operations.summary: Search all Languages with diverse filters (JSON or XML)

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Your Joshua Project API key.

parameters.name: countries
parameters.description: A bar separated list of one or more countries to filter by. Use the 2 letter FIPS 10-4 code. [View all Country Codes]

parameters.name: has_audio
parameters.description: A boolean that states whether you want Languages who have access to audio Bibles. (y or n)

parameters.name: has_completed_bible
parameters.description: A boolean that states whether you want Languages who have access to a completed Bible. (y or n)

parameters.name: has_four_laws
parameters.description: A boolean that states whether you want Languages who have access to the 4 Spiritual Laws. (y or n)

parameters.name: has_gods_story
parameters.description: A boolean that states whether you want Languages who have access to the God's Story resource. (y or n)

parameters.name: has_jesus_film
parameters.description: A boolean that states whether you want Languages who have access to the Jesus Film. (y or n)

parameters.name: has_new_testament
parameters.description: A boolean that states whether you want Languages who have access to the New Testament. (y or n)

parameters.name: has_portions
parameters.description: A boolean that states whether you want Languages who have access to the portions of the Bible. (y or n)

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: A bar separated list of one or more language codes to filter by. Use the 3 letter ISO code. See this chart for the codes.

parameters.name: jpscale
parameters.description: A bar separated list of one or more JPScale codes to filter by. Only accepts the following codes: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5. For more information check out https://joshuaproject.net/global_list/progress.

parameters.name: least_reached
parameters.description: A boolean that states whether you want Languages that are least reached. (y or n)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum results to return. (Defaults to 100)

parameters.name: needs_translation_questionable
parameters.description: A boolean that states whether you want Languages whose need for Bible translation is questionable. (y or n)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of results to display  (Defaults to 1)

parameters.name: pc_adherent
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum percentage of Adherents.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get Languages matching that percentage.

parameters.name: pc_evangelical
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum percentage of Evangelicals.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get People Groups matching that percentage. Decimals accepted!

parameters.name: population
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum population.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get Languages matching that number.

parameters.name: primary_religions
parameters.description:
A bar separated list of one or more primary religions to filter by. Use the following numbers:
  • 1 - Christianity
  • 2 - Buddhism
  • 4 - Ethnic Religions
  • 5 - Hinduism
  • 6 - Islam
  • 7 - Non-Religious
  • 8 - Other/Small
  • 9 - Unknown

parameters.name: world_speakers
parameters.description: A dashed seperated range specifying the minimum and maximum number of world speakers.(min-max) You can supply just the minimum to get Languages matching that number of world speakers.

errorResponses.reason: Bad request.  Your request is malformed in some way.  Check your supplied parameters.
Unauthorized.  Your missing your API key, or it has been suspended.
Not found.  Your search ended up with no results.

operations.notes: Retrieve a list of Languages that match your filter settings.

apis.description: Find all Languages that match your filter criteria.
